title: TikTok Discovers Sex Panther, Blue Checks (Still) For Sale 11.01.22
itunes:title: TikTok Discovers Sex Panther, Blue Checks (Still) For Sale 11.01.22
description:
In episode 1363, Jack and Miles are joined by comedy writer, actor, and co-host of Quick Question, Soren Bowie, to discuss… Crowd Crushes Are Frustratingly Preventable But Media Narratives Don’t Help, Twitter’s Blue Check Marks Were Already For Sale, Pheromone Products Probably Aren’t Brainwashing TikTokers and more!

  1. Crowd Crushes Are Frustratingly Preventable But Media Narratives Don’t Help
  2. At Least 151 Killed in Halloween Crowd Surge in Seoul
  3. Twitter’s Blue Check Marks Were Already For Sale
  4. The black market for blue checks
  5. Twitter is planning to start charging $20 per month for verification
  6. Why Twitter Verifies Users: The History Behind the Blue Checkmark
  7. Tony La Russa Sues Twitter Over Alleged Fake Page
  8. Tony La Russa Twitter lawsuit settled
  9. Pheromone Products Probably Aren’t Brainwashing TikTokers
  10. AN HONEST REVIEW OF THE PHEROMONE PERFUME THAT’S ALL OVER TIKTOK
  11. Why you shouldn’t buy products with ‘pheromones’ in them to get a Valentine
  12. How one perfume company misled scientists into believing in human sex pheromones
  13. CAN PHEROMONES CONTROL SOMEONE'S MIND, LIKE IN BLACK WIDOW? THE SCIENCE BEHIND THE FICTION

LISTEN: Poland by Lil Yachty

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
